fields.headline: Marketing
fields.bodyText: Royal Mail has appointed Paul Rich to the new role of group marketing director amid speculation the managing director, Gillian Wilmot, is to quit. The Sainsbury's customer marketing director, Stephen Vowles, is leaving to join the firm's US subsidiary, Shaw's, in a shake-up of senior marketing roles. Top UK marketeers have warned the government they will reconsider their roles advising on New Labour's adspend unless their recommendations carry greater weight. Lloyds TSB has poached Mars marketeer Helen Stevenson after almost a year-long search to fill its top marketing post. Singing fat ladies will form the basis of Silk Cut's advertising swansong as owner Gallagher Tobacco faces up to the impending ad ban. Siemens Mobile has appointed Niclas Friese-Greene to the new role of senior vice-president of global marketing communication as it seeks to become a worldwide consumer brand. Camelot is to launch internet games called Flirtathon, Holiday Bonanza and Predict-a-Ball in a bid to improve National Lottery sales.
